channel.title: Npc spawn times?
channel.description:
I have managed to make it so you need a certain combat or strength or any level to kill a monster but how can i make it so that when a monster dies it takes like 2 and a half mins to respawn not like 30 seconds and also send a message when someone kills it?
thanks very much[br][size=1]Posted on: July 25, 2007, 04:46:44 PM[/size][hr]Anyone?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 26, 2007, 08:26:10 AM[/size][hr]Anyone at all?

item.title: Npc spawn times?
item.dc:creator: @Unknown_Mop Unknown Mop
item.description:
@Unknown_Mop wrote:

This helped me too. ++'d.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc spawn times?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

That shouldn’t be to hard just add a new else if statement for the timer

and you have to call your client to use the playerName methods so use something like this

} else if (npcs[i].npcType >= 50 && npcs[i].npcType <= 51) { //Black dragon client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[GetNpcKiller(i)]; c.bdpoints += 1; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (c.playerName+ "has killed the king black dragon.");

Read full topic

item.title: Npc spawn times?
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

[quote=“Onlyme, post:13, topic:127206”][quote author=i_own_pking link=topic=177583.msg1629455#msg1629455 date=1185498274]
Umm check who ++ me? its for my tutorials which werent bad also how do i make it give a message after you kill it? to all people saying who killed it because when i try it just cannot find any of the symbols i use.[br][size=1]Posted on: July 26, 2007, 02:03:37 PM[/size][hr][quote author=Mod Adam link=topic=177583.msg1629376#msg1629376 date=1185496635]
Whats the point of triple posting?
[/quote]

its not triple posting? think its merged that’s really triple posting?
[/quote]

I can’t believe you lol… Okay so your saying… "hey, After i kill a NPC i want it to do a sendMessage, very simple

heres a snip of code from my npc counter for one of my mini games, you figure out where to add it.

[ } else if (npcs[i].npcType >= 50 && npcs[i].npcType <= 51) { //Black dragon client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[GetNpcKiller(i)]; c.bdpoints += 1; c.sendMessage("You killed the king black dragon and gained a kbd point.");[/quote]

Right ill start from the beggining…

Have you ever been on dodian?

they have bosses such as dad and when you kill them it sends the message to all players… ofcourse i can do that but it gives me errors doing it because playerNameisnt a known thing in npchandler

i want a certain npc to respawn slower than others as in dad would take 2.5mins and others would be normal time

Read full topic

[ } else if (npcs[i].npcType >= 50 && npcs[i].npcType <= 51) { //Black dragon client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[GetNpcKiller(i)]; c.bdpoints += 1; c.sendMessage("You killed the king black dragon and gained a kbd point.");

item.title: Npc spawn times?
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

[quote=“Onlyme, post:6, topic:127206”]Okay, I guess ill help you.

Open up your NPCHandler.java

look for where all your NPC death animation are, underneat them you should see this

npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].animUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].DeadApply = true; npcs[i].actionTimer = 10; if(npcs[i].followingPlayer && server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].followPlayer] != null) server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].followPlayer].summonedNPCS--; } else if (npcs[i].actionTimer == 0 && npcs[i].DeadApply == true && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false && npcs[i] != null) { MonsterDropItem(i); npcs[i].NeedRespawn = true; npcs[i].actionTimer = 10; npcs[i].absX = npcs[i].makeX; npcs[i].absY = npcs[i].makeY; npcs[i].animNumber = 0x328; npcs[i].HP = npcs[i].MaxHP; npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].animUpdateRequired = true;

now you will see theses, change them to your likings

					npcs[i].DeadApply = true;
					npcs[i].actionTimer = 10; [b]This is the death timer, calculates how fast the emote last on dying[/b]

					npcs[i].NeedRespawn = true;
					npcs[i].actionTimer = 10; [b]This is the death re spawn timer, calculates how fast the actual NPC will respond back to where it was after death last.[/b]

How do you have 20+ rep lol?[/quote]

dosnt that make all npc’s respawn at that time?

Read full topic

item.title: Npc spawn times?
item.dc:creator: @The_Moose The Moose
item.description:
@The_Moose wrote:

[quote=“Onlyme, post:6, topic:127206”]Okay, I guess ill help you.

Open up your NPCHandler.java

look for where all your NPC death animation are, underneat them you should see this

npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].animUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].DeadApply = true; npcs[i].actionTimer = 10; [b]This is the death timer, calculates how fast the emote last on dying[/b] if(npcs[i].followingPlayer && server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].followPlayer] != null) server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].followPlayer].summonedNPCS--; } else if (npcs[i].actionTimer == 0 && npcs[i].DeadApply == true && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false && npcs[i] != null) { MonsterDropItem(i); npcs[i].NeedRespawn = true; npcs[i].actionTimer = 10; [b]This is the death reapawntimer, calculates how fast the actually NPC will respond back where it was after death last.[/b] npcs[i].absX = npcs[i].makeX; npcs[i].absY = npcs[i].makeY; npcs[i].animNumber = 0x328; npcs[i].HP = npcs[i].MaxHP; npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].animUpdateRequired = true;

How do you have 20+ rep lol?[/quote]
The people were drunk when they ++'d him.

item.title: Npc spawn times?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Okay, I guess ill help you.

Open up your NPCHandler.java

look for where all your NPC death animation are, underneat them you should see this

npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].animUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].DeadApply = true; npcs[i].actionTimer = 10; if(npcs[i].followingPlayer && server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].followPlayer] != null) server.playerHandler.players[npcs[i].followPlayer].summonedNPCS--; } else if (npcs[i].actionTimer == 0 && npcs[i].DeadApply == true && npcs[i].NeedRespawn == false && npcs[i] != null) { MonsterDropItem(i); npcs[i].NeedRespawn = true; npcs[i].actionTimer = 10; npcs[i].absX = npcs[i].makeX; npcs[i].absY = npcs[i].makeY; npcs[i].animNumber = 0x328; npcs[i].HP = npcs[i].MaxHP; npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].animUpdateRequired = true;

now you will see theses, change them to your likings

					npcs[i].DeadApply = true;
					npcs[i].actionTimer = 10; [b]This is the death timer, calculates how fast the emote last on dying[/b]

					npcs[i].NeedRespawn = true;
					npcs[i].actionTimer = 10; [b]This is the death re spawn timer, calculates how fast the actual NPC will respond back to where it was after death last.[/b]

How do you have 20+ rep lol?

Read full topic
